Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scaraboid
Description: The recto of this scaraboid is adorned with two bands of perpendicular chevrons, which delineate four sections in which stylised cobras have been carved. A text mentioning the name of Menkheperre (Thutmosis III) is carved on the reverse.
